description: Try our easy to follow Active Balance Spring Bowl recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Bowl,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Quick & easy breakfast,Egg free,Spring,Raspberry,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Peanut free
name: Active Balance Spring Bowl Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g Freedom Foods Active Balance Multigrain & Cranberry

recipeInstructions.text: To create this classic, layer Freedom Foods Active Balance flakes and fresh fruit in a bowl and add almond milk.
